attributes.action: Make it mandatory in schools to employ a nurture teacher for Health&Wellbeing.
attributes.additional_details: The number of children struggling with emotional issues is on the increase. Until we deal with the emotional wellbeing of our children they are not in a position to fulfil their full academic potential.
attributes.background: With the rise in mental health and social factors affecting our children’s emotional wellbeing and as a parent of of child with mental health issues I am aware of the need for consistent support from a key person. Ensuring that support is delivered in the same way and on a regular basis is vital.
